content: Yes this is the problem. I would need more precise instructions for me to attempt to fix problem with css. seems like thunderbird could be fixed so it works like it used to by dragging bottom line of box to resize
creator: richb44

content:
Press Alt to show the Menu Bar, then enable it under View/Toolbars. Message Source is under View, or Ctrl+U.

Keep in mind that viewing the source does open the message. There is no such thing as a 'preview' that doesn't open the message. Only the Subject, From, Date headers etc. can be seen without opening.
creator: sfhowes
